overview: Presenting the prettiest pink pussies the graduating class has to offer: tender, coral-pink labes framed by wisps of adolescent pubic hair - sweet teen treats that clutch tight around one finger. Director Clive McLean creates muff magic again in this irresistibly naughty series - winner of AVN's Best Vignette Award two years running! Barely Legal girls. Outrageously wild Barely Legal sex! "Come play with us."
title: Barely Legal 47
